text: <@UNAHJV5SM> ran into a strange issue where `using Pkg; Pkg.add("LighthouseFlux")` in an empty environment fails on Julia 1.4 due to a resolver error, and works on Julia 1.5. It's very weird especially since we test LighthouseFlux on 1.4 in CI: <https://github.com/beacon-biosignals/LighthouseFlux.jl/blob/master/.travis.yml>. Any ideas? (stacktrace in the thread)

elements.text: ran into a strange issue where
in an empty environment fails on Julia 1.4 due to a resolver error, and works on Julia 1.5. It's very weird especially since we test LighthouseFlux on 1.4 in CI:

text:
On 1.4:
``` ❯ julia

|__/                   |

text: Oh no, it's something bad with having a private registry with older versions of the same package. If I start Julia with a empty depot (via `JULIA_DEPOT_PATH`) then it installs ok on 1.4.
